articles.author: Simone McCarthy
articles.title: China’s Xi hails ‘best in history’ Africa ties, pledges military aid - CNN
articles.description: China is enjoying its “best in history” ties with African nations, leader Xi Jinping said on Thursday, as he pledged $50 billion in financial support for the continent, in addition to military aid.
articles.content:
Editors Note: Sign up for CNNs Meanwhile in China newsletter which explores what you need to know about the countrys rise and how it impacts the world.
